channel.title: Server Help, Standard Shards Revolution?
channel.description:
I need help coding a Shard Revolutions server. It's the original, so I will have to do everything including pvp pvm home shops etc.
I really need someone's help, someone committed to helping people learn. I'm 14 years old and I decided coding is what I will do with my life, even though I currently suck. So I just wanted to do a private server, something I've wanted for 2 years, but me and my brother are currently trying to seriously get it done. [b]I have aim, so if you do too, we can use it for easy messaging... aim name is: tsunadevovo@gmail.com[/b]
Please pm me your aim username and tell me your experience with creating private servers. :) ;D :D
